sentence.Network_en: She certainly hasn't been pining while you were away!
sentence.Network_cn: 你不在的时候她可并不难受.

sentence.Network_en: She sat in the house day after day, pining for her lover.
sentence.Network_cn: 她一连几天坐在房屋里, 思念着自己的情人.

sentence.Network_en: She is pining to travel abroad.

entry.def: A pine tree or a pine is a tall tree which has very thin, sharp leaves and a fresh smell. Pine trees have leaves all year round.

entry.tran: （因死亡或离别而）怀念，苦苦思念，为…难过
entry.def: If you pine for someone who has died or gone away, you want them to be with you very much and feel sad because they are not there.

example.ex: She'd be sitting at home pining for her lost husband...
example.tran: 她会坐在家里，思念死去的丈夫。

example.ex: Make sure your pet won't pine while you're away.
example.tran: 要确保不在家时宠物不会想你。

entry.tran: 渴望，苦苦盼望（尤指不大可能拥有的东西）
entry.def: If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it.

example.ex: ...the democracy they have pined for since 1939.
example.tran: 从1939年以来他们就一直盼望着的民主
